text:
we can upload a zip file as an asset. but we don't have procedure for adding 
that zip file to the document and publish it.

i read all the documentation but i didn't get it. if it is there how can add 
zip file to the document.
creator: srinivas.gurram@logicacmg.com
andreas@apache.org
text:
This works with 1.4-dev:

- edit with BXE
- "Add asset" (the scroll icon)
